black-fade{0%{background:#000}to{background:transparent}}@-webkit-keyframes fade-in{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes fade-in{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}
/*# sourceMappingURL=critical-sciencecore.css.map */
  </style>

   Science | AAAS

  <link as="style" href="//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto+Condensed:400,400i,700,700i|Roboto:400,400i,700&amp;subset=cyrillic,cyrillic-ext,greek,greek-ext,latin-ext,vietnamese" onload="this.rel='stylesheet'" rel="preload"/>
  <link href="/sites/default/files/advagg_css/css__9zevyd0vccxBdypcX9OJeu887I9k_IxZIqGmgb98Hdk__5db1AK6VA9IKDQM72zlEkoVKhTQAHAFP4yWEEcS0yuY__UOzmQSdWHeLnyauzbPkicN32jIeyE2WeuQbpb2iwHUk.css" media="all" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
  <link href="/sites/default/files/advagg_css/css__0ndevJxur7TQ7fV_TioyY5AP-vKX7eFSWNOnX5Ce6Kg__UDZhNHUuVq2tXSMaRBUF3xBngbHBdheirB9uW3UclWE__UOzmQSdWHeLnyauzbPkicN32jIeyE2WeuQbpb2iwHUk.css" media="all" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
  <noscript>
   <link href="//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Roboto+Condensed:400,400i,700,700i|Roboto:400,400i,700&amp;subset=cyrillic,cyrillic-ext,greek,greek-ext,latin-ext,vietnamese" rel="preload"/>
  </noscript>
  <script id="loadcss">
   /*! loadCSS: load a CSS file asynchronously. [c]2016 @scottjehl, Filament Group, Inc. Licensed MIT */
(function(w){
	"use strict";
	/* exported loadCSS */
	var loadCSS = function( href, before, media ){
		// Arguments explained:
		// `href` [REQUIRED] is the URL for your CSS file.
		// `before` [OPTIONAL] is the element the script should use as a reference for injecting our stylesheet <link> before
			// By default, loadCSS attempts to inject the link after the last stylesheet or script in the DOM. However, you might desire a more specific location in your document.
		// `media` [OPTIONAL] is the media type or query of the stylesheet. By default it will be 'all'
		var doc = w.document;
		var ss = doc.createElement( "link" );
		var ref;
		if( before ){
			ref = before;
		}
		else {
			var refs = ( doc.body || doc.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ] ).childNodes;
			ref = refs[ refs.length - 1];
		}

		var sheets = doc.styleSheets;
		ss.rel = "stylesheet";
		ss.href = href;
		// temporarily set media to something inapplicable to ensure it'll fetch without blocking render
		ss.media = "only x";

		// wait until body is defined before injecting link. This ensures a non-blocking load in IE11.
		function ready( cb ){
			if( doc.body ){
				return cb();
			}
			setTimeout(function(){
				ready( cb );
			});
		}
		// Inject link
			// Note: the ternary preserves the existing behavior of "before" argument, but we could choose to change the argument to "after" in a later release and standardize on ref.nextSibling for all refs
			// Note: `insertBefore` is used instead of `appendChild`, for safety re: http://www.paulirish.com/2011/surefire-dom-element-insertion/
		ready( function(){
			ref.parentNode.insertBefore( ss, ( before ? ref : ref.nextSibling ) );
		});
		// A method (exposed on return object for external use) that mimics onload by polling document.styleSheets until it includes the new sheet.
		var onloadcssdefined = function( cb ){
			var resolvedHref = ss.href;
			var i = sheets.length;
			while( i-- ){
				if( sheets[ i ].href === resolvedHref ){
					return cb();
				}
			}
			setTimeout(function() {
				onloadcssdefined( cb );
			});
		};

		function loadCB(){
			if( ss.addEventListener ){
				ss.removeEventListener( "load", loadCB );
			}
			ss.media = media || "all";
		}

		// once loaded, set link's media back to `all` so that the stylesheet applies once it loads
		if( ss.addEventListener ){
			ss.addEventListener( "load", loadCB);
		}
		ss.onloadcssdefined = onloadcssdefined;
		onloadcssdefined( loadCB );
		return ss;
	};
	// commonjs
	if( typeof exports !== "undefined" ){
		exports.loadCSS = loadCSS;
	}
	else {
		w.loadCSS = loadCSS;
	}
}( typeof global !== "undefined" ? global : this ));
      /*! CSS rel=preload polyfill. Depends on loadCSS function. [c]2016 @scottjehl, Filament Group, Inc. Licensed MIT  */
(function( w ){
  // rel=preload support test
  if( !w.loadCSS ){
    return;
  }
  var rp = loadCSS.relpreload = {};
  rp.support = function(){
    try {
      return w.document.createElement( "link" ).relList.supports( "preload" );
    } catch (e) {
      return false;
    }
  };

  // loop preload links and fetch using loadCSS
  rp.poly = function(){
    var links = w.document.getElementsByTagName( "link" );
    for( var i = 0; i < links.length; i++ ){
      var link = links[ i ];
      if( link.rel === "preload" && link.getAttribute( "as" ) === "style" ){
        w.loadCSS( link.href, link );
        link.rel = null;
      }
    }
  };

  // if link[rel=preload] is not supported, we must fetch the CSS manually using loadCSS
  if( !rp.support() ){
    rp.poly();
    var run = w.setInterval( rp.poly, 300 );
    if( w.addEventListener ){
      w.addEventListener( "load", function(){
        w.clearInterval( run );
      } );
    }
    if( w.attachEvent ){
      w.attachEvent( "onload", function(){
        w.clearInterval( run );
      } )
    }
  }
}( this ));
  </script>
 </head>

       <g fill="#fff">
        <path d="M4.73010157 47.178324L2.62773215 50.4729356.394022053 50.4729356 0 33.9998776 1.57663929 33.9998776C4.33571213 41.5115553 8.40874288 48.6278429 16.5549881 48.6278429 22.3358151         </path>
       </g>
      </svg>
     </a>
    </div>
    <div class="gh__nav-search" id="ghNavSearch" style="transform: translateX(100%); transition: transform 0.2s ease-in-out 0s;">

    text-decoration: underline;

    margin-top: 0; 
    padding: 0.5em
  }
  #coronalert a {
    color: #ffffff;
    text-decoration: underline;
  }

    text-decoration: underline;
  }

               <article class="media">
                <div class="media__icon">
                 <a href="/news/2021/03/titan-s-largest-crater-might-be-perfect-cradle-life">
                  <img alt="Illustration of the surface of Titan" src="//www.sciencemag.org/sites/default/files/styles/grid_thumb_-_290x163__16_9_/public/main_titan_1280.jpg?itok=QW-hVJ5I" typeof="foaf:Image"/>
                 </a>
                </div>
                <div class="media__body">
                 <h2 class="media__headline">
                  <a href="/news/2021/03/titan-s-largest-crater-might-be-perfect-cradle-life">
                   Titans largest crater might be the perfect cradle for life
                  </a>
                 </h2>
                 <span class="rdf-meta element-hidden" content="Titans largest crater might be the perfect cradle for life" property="dc:title">
                 </span>
                 <p class="byline">
                  By
                  <a href="/author/jonathan-o-callaghan">
                   Jonathan OCallaghan
                  </a>
                  <time>
                   Mar. 19, 2021
                  </time>
                 </p>
                </div>
               </article>
              </li>
              <li>
               <article class="media">
                <div class="media__icon">
                 <a href="/news/2021/03/ten-years-later-here-s-what-fukushima-s-damaged-reactors-look-today">

                 </a>
                </div>

     <div class="secondary" id="content_side">
      <div id="aaas-oas_Right2">
      </div>
      <div class="layout-item home__express">
       <div class="view-feed-blocks-science-express">
        <h2 class="subsection-title heading--block">
         First Release
         <cite>
          Science
         </cite>
         papers
        </h2>
        <div class="item-list">
         <ul class="headline-list">
          <li class="row-1 odd first">
           <article class="media media--priority-2">
            <div class="media__body">
             <h2 class="media__headline">
              <span class="field-content">
               <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/cgi/content/short/science.abf8003v1?rss=1">
                Timing the SARS-CoV-2 index case in Hubei province
               </a>
              </span>
             </h2>
            </div>
           </article>
          </li>
          <li class="row-2 even">
           <article class="media media--priority-2">
            <div class="media__body">
             <h2 class="media__headline">
              <span class="field-content">
               <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/cgi/content/short/science.abb9860v1?rss=1">
                Gate-controlled BCS-BEC crossover in a two-dimensional superconductor
               </a>
              </span>
             </h2>
            </div>
           </article>
          </li>
          <li class="row-3 odd">
           <article class="media media--priority-2">
            <div class="media__body">
             <h2 class="media__headline">
              <span class="field-content">
               <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/cgi/content/short/science.abf2303v1?rss=1">
                Structural impact on SARS-CoV-2 spike protein by D614G substitution
               </a>
              </span>
             </h2>
            </div>
           </article>
          </li>
          <li class="row-4 even last">
           <article class="media media--priority-2">
            <div class="media__body">
             <h2 class="media__headline">
              <span class="field-content">
               <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/cgi/content/short/science.abc7717v1?rss=1">
                Long-term drying of Mars by sequestration of ocean-scale volumes of water in the crust
               </a>
              </span>
             </h2>
            </div>
           </article>
          </li>
         </ul>
        </div>
        <p class="meta-line meta-line--more">

   <div class="row">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="primary" id="content_5">
      <h2 class="subsection-title heading--block">
       Editor's Picks
      </h2>
      <div class="categories__grid">
       <div class="category-item">
        <article about="/research-article/immunological-memory-sars-cov-2-assessed-8-months-after-infection" class="media headline-list__outer-lead" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">
         <div class="media__icon">
          <img alt="Figure showing distribution of memory cells 1 month and 6 months after infection." src="//www.sciencemag.org/sites/default/files/styles/article_main_medium/public/highwire/large/sci/371/6529/eabf4063-F1.large.jpg?itok=O-R3bC30&amp;c=7bb39500cea2d1f4c925793eca79f92d" typeof="foaf:Image"/>
         </div>
         <div class="media__body">
          <h2 class="media__headline">
           <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/content/371/6529/eabf4063">
            Immunological memory to SARS-CoV-2 assessed for up to 8 months after infection
           </a>
          </h2>
          <span class="rdf-meta element-hidden" content="Immunological memory to SARS-CoV-2 assessed for up to 8 months after infection" property="dc:title">
          </span>
          <p class="byline">
           By
           <a href="/journal-author/jennifer-m-dan">
            Jennifer M. Dan
           </a>
           ,
           <a href="/journal-author/jose-mateus">
            Jose Mateus
           </a>
           ,
           <span class="et-al">
            et al.
           </span>
           <time>
            Feb. 5, 2021
           </time>
          </p>
         </div>
        </article>
        <ul class="item-list">
         <li>
          <article class="media media--priority-2">
           <div class="media__body">
            <h2 class="media__headline">
             <a href="/news/2021/02/illicit-centipede-raises-thorny-question-should-journals-have-refused-publish-paper">
              Illicit centipede raises thorny question: Should journals have refused to publish a paper about it?
             </a>
            </h2>
            <span class="rdf-meta element-hidden" content="Illicit centipede raises thorny question: Should journals have refused to publish a paper about it?" property="dc:title">
            </span>
            <p class="byline">
             By
             <a href="/author/yao-hua-law">
              Yao-Hua Law
             </a>
             <time>
              Feb. 10, 2021
             </time>
            </p>
           </div>
          </article>
         </li>
         <li>
          <article class="media media--priority-2">
           <div class="media__body">
            <h2 class="media__headline">
             <a href="http://advances.sciencemag.org/content/7/7/eabe9510">
              Oldest known conch shell horn
             </a>
            </h2>
            <span class="rdf-meta element-hidden" content="First record of the sound produced by the oldest Upper Paleolithic seashell horn" property="dc:title">
            </span>
            <p class="byline">
             By
             <a href="/journal-author/c-fritz">
              C. Fritz
             </a>
             ,
             <a href="/journal-author/g-tosello">
              G. Tosello
             </a>
             ,
             <span class="et-al">
              et al.
             </span>
             <time>
              Feb. 10, 2021
             </time>
            </p>
           </div>
          </article>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>
       <div class="category-item">
        <article about="/news/2021/02/martian-rover-sends-back-overwhelming-video-audio-red-planet" class="media headline-list__outer-lead" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

          </a>
         </div>

     <div class="secondary" id="content_side_5">

       <h2 class="title subsection-title">
        Latest News
       </h2>

   <div class="row">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="primary" id="content_6">
      <div class="view-article-lists-block-11">
       <h2 class="subsection-title">
        <cite>
         Science
        </cite>
        Podcast
        <a href="/podcasts">
         View all episodes
        </a>
       </h2>
       <div>
        <article class="media media--featured">
         <div class="media__icon">
          <a href="/podcast/covid-19-treatment-1-year-and-smarter-materials-smarter-cities">
           <img alt="smart panels on a building with audio button overlay" src="//www.sciencemag.org/sites/default/files/styles/article_main_teaser/public/images/smart-city-overlay.jpg?itok=Sts3nW4s" typeof="foaf:Image"/>
          </a>
         </div>
         <div class="media__body">
          <h3 class="overline">
           <span class="date-display-single" content="2021-03-18T14:00:00-04:00" datatype="xsd:dateTime" property="dc:date">
            Mar. 18, 2021
           </span>
          </h3>
          <div class="file-audio audio--podcast align-right">
           <span class="audio__title">
            COVID-19 treatment at 1 year, and smarter materials for smarter cities
           </span>
           <div class="mediaelement-audio">
            <audio class="mediaelement-formatter-identifier-1616351105-0" controls="controls" preload="none" src="https://traffic.omny.fm/d/clips/aaea4e69-af51-495e-afc9-a9760146922b/95ab13e7-f709-4a58-acad-aaea01775538/576faffd-d153-4b14-a0ea-acee0116cfa1/audio.mp3">
            </audio>
           </div>
          </div>
          <h2 class="media__headline">
           <a href="/podcast/covid-19-treatment-1-year-and-smarter-materials-smarter-cities">
            Podcast: COVID-19 treatment at 1 year, and smarter materials for smarter cities
           </a>
          </h2>
          <span class="rdf-meta element-hidden" content="COVID-19 treatment at 1 year, and smarter materials for smarter cities" property="dc:title">
          </span>
          <div class="media__deck">
           On this weeks show: How doctors treat coronavirus patients, and why we should use self-healing concrete and metamaterials to build living cities
          </div>
          <ul class="podcast-options">
           <li>
            <a href="https://traffic.omny.fm/d/clips/aaea4e69-af51-495e-afc9-a9760146922b/95ab13e7-f709-4a58-acad-aaea01775538/576faffd-d153-4b14-a0ea-acee0116cfa1/audio.mp3">
             Download MP3
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="/podcasts">
             Past Episodes
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="/rss/podcast.xml">
             Science Podcast RSS Feed
            </a>
           </li>
           <li>
            <a href="http://phobos.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewPodcast?id=120329020" target="_blank">
             Subscribe Through iTunes
            </a>
           </li>
          </ul>
         </div>
        </article>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="secondary" id="content_side_6">
      <p>
       <a href="//www.sciencemag.org/custom-publishing/webinars">
        <img alt="Webinar Promo" src="//www.sciencemag.org/sites/default/files/Unknown.jpeg?itok=vyZlX3Jn"/>

   <div class="row">
    <div class="container">
     <div class="primary" id="content_7">
      <h2 class="subsection-title heading--block">
       How To Get Published
      </h2>
      <p>
       The strength of
       <cite>
        Science
       </cite>
       and its online journal sites rests with the strengths of its community of authors, who provide cutting-edge research, incisive scientific commentary, and insights on whats important to the scientific world. To learn more about how to get published in any of our journals,
       <a href="//www.sciencemag.org/authors/contributing-science-family-journals">
        visit our guide for contributors
       </a>
       , or visit the how-to page for each individual journal.
      </p>
      <p>
       <a href="//www.sciencemag.org/authors/information-authors">
        <cite>
         Science
        </cite>
       </a>
       |
       <a href="//advances.sciencemag.org/content/information-authors">
        <cite>
         Science Advances
        </cite>
       </a>
       |
       <a href="//www.sciencemag.org/journals/immunology/information-for-authors">
        <cite>
         Science Immunology
        </cite>
       </a>
       |
       <a href="//www.sciencemag.org/journals/robotics/information-for-authors">
        <cite>
         Science Robotics
        </cite>
       </a>
       |
       <a href="//stke.sciencemag.org/about/ifora">
        <cite>
         Science Signaling
        </cite>
       </a>
       |
       <a href="//stm.sciencemag.org/content/information-authors">
        <cite>
         Science Translational Medicine
        </cite>
       </a>
      </p>
      <a class="btn--cta btn--cta--large align-right" href="//cts.sciencemag.org/scc/login.html;jsessionid=A99A8B34CD07506DDEF791E0C91183B4" style="width: auto; display: inline-block;">
       Get Started
      </a>
     </div>
     <div class="secondary" id="content_side_7">
      <!-- <img src="http://styleguide.sciencemag.org/images/intrivoten.png"> -->
      <div id="aaas-oas_x51">
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div class="row row--alt" lang="en">
   <div class="container container--promo">
    <div class="primary">
     <a class="heading--block" href="https://science.sciencemag.org/">
      <h2 class="subsection-title">
       Read the Latest Issue of
       <em>
        Science
       </em>
      </h2>
     </a>
     <div class="primary__main promo-foot--mag">
      <div class="promo-foot--current">
       <div class="view-footer-promo-block-issue-footer">
        <div>
         <h3>
          19 March 2021
         </h3>
         <p class="promo-foot__meta">
          Vol 371,

      Issue 6535
         </p>
         <a href="https://science.sciencemag.org/">
          <img alt="Magazine Cover" class="promo-foot__cover" src="/sites/default/files/styles/medium/public/highwire/covers/sci/371/6535/-F1.medium.gif?itok=rH3gZQG6"/>
         </a>
         <a class="btn--cta btn--cta--small" href="https://science.sciencemag.org" style="margin-top:10px;width:173px;">
          Table of Contents
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="promo-foot--heds">
       <div class="view-footer-promo-block-footer-news">
        <ul class="media-grid media-grid--2 media-grid--minor">
         <li>
          <h3 class="overline overline--priority-2">
           Epidemiology
          </h3>
          <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/content/371/6535/1195">
           Medicine's longest year
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <h3 class="overline overline--priority-2">

           Europe may bar neighbors from key research
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <h3 class="overline overline--priority-2">
           Cell Biology
          </h3>
          <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/content/371/6535/1192">
           Biologists revel in pinpointing active genes in tissue samples
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <h3 class="overline overline--priority-2">
           Epidemiology
          </h3>
          <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/content/371/6535/1191">
           Studies chase clues to immune syndrome in kids
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <h3 class="overline overline--priority-2">
           Evolution
          </h3>
          <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/content/371/6535/1190">
           Genome reveals giraffe's recipe for standing tall
          </a>
         </li>
         <li>
          <h3 class="overline overline--priority-2">
           Cell Biology
          </h3>
          <a href="http://science.sciencemag.org/content/371/6535/1189">
           Key human embryo stage mimicked in the lab
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>

      <style>
       @media (width: 1025px) {
  .gh__toggle {
    display: -webkit-box !important;
    display: -ms-flexbox !important;
    display: flex !important;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
-ms-flex-align: center;
align-items: center;
  }
.gh__nav-search, .gh__site .gh__nav-search,  #gh_header .gh__site #ghNavSearch.gh__nav-search {
  transform: translateX(100%) !important;
  -ms-transform: translateX(100%) !important;
  -webkit-transform: translateX(100%) !important;
  -moz-transform: translateX(100%) !important;
  -o-transform: translateX(100%) !important;
}
.overlay .gh__nav-search, .gh__site.overlay .gh__nav-search,  #gh_header .gh__site.overlay #ghNavSearch.gh__nav-search {
  transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -ms-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -webkit-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -moz-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -o-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
}

}

@media (max-width: 1025px) {
  .gh__toggle {
    display: -webkit-box !important;
    display: -ms-flexbox !important;
    display: flex !important;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
-ms-flex-align: center;
align-items: center;
  }
.gh__nav-search, .gh__site .gh__nav-search,  #gh_header .gh__site #ghNavSearch.gh__nav-search {
  transform: translateX(100%) !important;
  -ms-transform: translateX(100%) !important;
  -webkit-transform: translateX(100%) !important;
  -moz-transform: translateX(100%) !important;
  -o-transform: translateX(100%) !important;
}
.overlay .gh__nav-search, .gh__site.overlay .gh__nav-search,  #gh_header .gh__site.overlay #ghNavSearch.gh__nav-search {
  transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -ms-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -webkit-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -moz-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -o-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
}

}
@media (min-width: 1026px){
  .gh__nav-search, #gh_header .gh__site #ghNavSearch.gh__nav-search {
  transform:none !important;
  transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -ms-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -webkit-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -moz-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
  -o-transform: translateX(0px) !important;
}
}
      </style>

          <a class="social__icon" href="https://twitter.com/sciencemagazine" target="_blank">
           <i class="fa fa-twitter">
           </i>
          </a>
         </li>

          </a>
         </li>

    </footer>
   </div>
  </div>

   <div class="container container--footer">

     <div class="site-logo--footer">
      <a href="https://www.aaas.org" target="_blank">
       <img alt="AAAS" src="/sites/all/themes/science/images/logo-aaas.svg" title="American Association for the Advancement of Science"/>
      </a>

       American Association for the Advancement of Science

      <a href="//www.who.int/hinari/en/" target="_blank">
       HINARI

      </a>

       CHORUS
      </a>

       CLOCKSS
      </a>

      <a href="//www.crossref.org/" target="_blank">
       CrossRef
      </a>
      and
      <a href="//www.projectcounter.org/" target="_blank">
       COUNTER
      </a>

     </p>
     <script type="text/javascript">
      function adDemo(param) {

      let urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);

      const oasLoaded = oas_tag;

      if (oasLoaded && urlParams.get(param)) {

        let campaign_page =  'sciencemag.org' + '/' + urlParams.get(param);

        function reload() {
          console.log(oas_tag.site_page, campaign_page);

          oas_tag.site_page = campaign_page;

          console.log('trying...');

          if (oas_tag.site_page === campaign_page) {
            oas_tag.reloadAds();
            clearInterval(adTimer);
            console.log('done.');
          }
        }

        let adTimer = setInterval(reload, 500);
      }
      else {
        // console.log("Nope!");
      }
    }
    adDemo('campaign');
     </script>
     <ul class="footlinks">

ance":{}},"mediaelement":{".mediaelement-formatter-identifier-1616351105-0":{"opts":{"audioHeight":80,"audioWidth":"100%","features":["playpause","progress","volume","current","tracks","duration","seeking","seekable","timerail"]},"controls":true}},"header":{"url":"www.sciencemag.org"}});

  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var fontTimeOut = 2000;

      var fontRoboto = new FontFaceObserver("Roboto");

      var fontRobotoBold = new FontFaceObserver("Roboto", {
        "weight": "bold"
      });

      var fontRobotoItalic = new FontFaceObserver("Roboto", {
        "font-style": "italic"
      });

      var fontRobotoBoldItalic = new FontFaceObserver("Roboto", {
        "font-weight": "bold",
        "font-style": "italic"
      });

      var fontRobotoCond = new FontFaceObserver("Roboto");

      var fontRobotoCondBold = new FontFaceObserver("Roboto Condensed", {
        "weight": "bold"
      });

      var fontRobotoCondItalic = new FontFaceObserver("Roboto Condensed", {
        "font-weight": "italic"
      });

      var fontRobotoCondBoldItalic = new FontFaceObserver("Roboto Condensed", {
        "font-weight": "bold",
        "font-style": "italic"
      });

      Promise.all ([
        fontRoboto.load(null, fontTimeOut),
        fontRobotoBold.load(null, fontTimeOut),
        fontRobotoItalic.load(null, fontTimeOut),
        fontRobotoBoldItalic.load(null, fontTimeOut),
        fontRobotoCond.load(null, fontTimeOut),
        fontRobotoCondBold.load(null, fontTimeOut),
        fontRobotoCondItalic.load(null, fontTimeOut),
        fontRobotoCondBoldItalic.load(null, fontTimeOut)
      ]).then ( function () {
        document.documentElement.className += " fonts-loaded";
      });
  </script>
  <script async="async" src="/sites/default/files/advagg_js/js__GM3GJPR36rRIz0TRkjC5OQwrioSyN9aoYRivDhCO_AM__qAl84FcCv2jyN22yFGS5Oc85cjd9zKX6p_cFNLGhe-M__UOzmQSdWHeLnyauzbPkicN32jIeyE2WeuQbpb2iwHUk.js" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script src="//assets.sciencemag.org/js/global-header-bundle.js" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
